Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,49 @@ +import React, { useRef } from "react"; + +export default function CompanyInfo({ data, update, next }) { + const logoRef = useRef(); + const bannerRef = useRef(); + + const onFile = (e, key) => { + const file = e.target.files?.[0]; + if (!file) return; + update({ [key]: { file, url: URL.createObjectURL(file) } }); + }; + + return ( +
+

Logo & Banner Image

+
+
+ +
+ {data.logo?.url ? :
Browse photo or drop here
} + onFile(e,'logo')} className="absolute w-full h-full opacity-0 cursor-pointer" type="file" accept="image/*" /> +
+
+ +
+ +
+ {data.banner?.url ? :
Browse photo or drop here (recommended 1520x400)
} + onFile(e,'banner')} className="absolute w-full h-full opacity-0 cursor-pointer" type="file" accept="image/*" /> +
+
+
+ +
+ + update({companyName: e.target.value})} className="w-full border rounded p-2 mt-1" /> +
+ +
